title: Mali and African American Studies- significance

content.question: Which of the following explains the significance of the Mali Empire to the discipline of African American Studies?

choices.label: It was an empire that resisted the trade of enslaved people to European merchants.
It was known for its global exchanges along the Swahili Coast with Persian, Indian, and Chinese traders.
It is an example of an advanced West African empire with a documented history of cultural contributions.
It was known for maintaining its political autonomy during North African attempts at territorial expansion.

content.answer: It is an example of an advanced West African empire with a documented history of cultural contributions.

skill.text: 1.D: Explain how course concepts, developments, and processes relate to the discipline of African American Studies.
